On August 27, 2025, a significant corporate development for NTPC Ltd involved its renewable energy subsidiary issuing a tender for a new solar project .

300 MW Solar Project Tender:NTPC Renewable Energy Limited (NTPC REL), a subsidiary of NTPC Ltd., opened the bidding process for a 300 MW grid-connected solar power project.

Project location:The project will be located near the NTPC Anta gas-fired power station in the Baran district of Rajasthan.

Scope of work:The successful bidder will be responsible for acquiring land for the solar project, engineering, installation, and commissioning. This also includes the development of the power evacuation system and the operation and maintenance of the plant for three years.

Dividend update:A news report published on August 27, 2025, included NTPC in a list of companies announcing upcoming dividend payouts in September 2025.
